result.eng: Are they listening to us?
result.ga: An bhfuil siad ag éisteacht linn
result.orig: An bhfuil siad ag éisteacht linn
result.html: An bhfuil siad ag éisteacht linnAre they listening to us?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil siad ag éisteaċt linnAre they listening to us?

result.eng: Now that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.
result.ga: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoire
result.orig: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoire
result.html: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoireNow that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.
result.ponchtml: Anois agus an saṁraḋ tosaiṫe is féidir linn dul ar saoireNow that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.

result.eng: We'd rather go on holiday in the winter.
result.ga: B'fhearr linn dul ar saoire sa gheimhreadh
result.orig: B'fhearr linn dul ar saoire sa gheimhreadh
result.html: B'fhearr linn dul ar saoire sa gheimhreadhWe'd rather go on holiday in the winter.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr linn dul ar saoire sa ġeiṁreaḋWe'd rather go on holiday in the winter.

result.eng: How can we overcome these problems?
result.ga: Conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárú
result.orig: Conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárú
result.html: Conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárúHow can we overcome these problems?
result.ponchtml: Conas is féidir linn na faḋbanna seo a ẛárúHow can we overcome these problems?

result.eng: Thank you for sharing your expertise with us.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linn
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linn
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linnThank you for sharing your expertise with us.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as do ẛaineolas a roinnt linnThank you for sharing your expertise with us.

result.eng: We prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.
result.ga: Is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin
result.orig: Is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin
result.html: Is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáinWe prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.
result.ponchtml: Is fearr linn fanaċt i mbrúnna ná in óstáinWe prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.

result.eng: We want healthy people to give blood.
result.ga: Is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú fola
result.orig: Is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú fola
result.html: Is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú folaWe want healthy people to give blood.
result.ponchtml: Is mian linn go mbeaḋ daoine sláintiúla ag deonú folaWe want healthy people to give blood.

result.eng: Whenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ga: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.orig: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.html: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beiḋ fáilte roṁatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.

result.eng: Aren't you supposed to be helping us?
result.ga: Nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linn
result.orig: Nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linn
result.html: Nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linnAren't you supposed to be helping us?
result.ponchtml: Naċ ḃfuil tú in ainm is a ḃeiṫ ag cuidiú linnAren't you supposed to be helping us?

result.eng: We can't compete with the big companies.
result.ga: Ní féidir linn dul san iomaíocht leis na comhlachtaí móra
result.orig: Ní féidir linn dul san iomaíocht leis na comhlachtaí móra
result.html: Ní féidir linn dul san iomaíocht leis na comhlachtaí móraWe can't compete with the big companies.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir linn dul san iomaíoċt leis na coṁlaċtaí móraWe can't compete with the big companies.

result.eng: We cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ga: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.orig: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.html: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir linn é a ṫaḃairt isteaċ toisc a ṁéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.

result.eng: They couldn't help us.
result.ga: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linn
result.orig: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linn
result.html: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linnThey couldn't help us.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ siad in ann caḃrú linnThey couldn't help us.

result.eng: We haven't managed to get a hold of the Chinese market yet.
result.ga: Níor éirigh linn greim a fháil ar mhargadh na Síne go fóill
result.orig: Níor éirigh linn greim a fháil ar mhargadh na Síne go fóill
result.html: Níor éirigh linn greim a fháil ar mhargadh na Síne go fóillWe haven't managed to get a hold of the Chinese market yet.
result.ponchtml: Níor éiriġ linn greim a ḟáil ar ṁargaḋ na Síne go fóillWe haven't managed to get a hold of the Chinese market yet.

result.eng: After all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ga: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.orig: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.html: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteachAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis an aiġnis ar fad d'éiriġ linn teaċt ar réiteaċAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.

result.eng: We liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.
result.ga: Thaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúil
result.orig: Thaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúil
result.html: Thaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúilWe liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn ḃí muintir na háite an-ċairdiúilWe liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.

result.eng: Can we go inside?
result.ga: An féidir linn dul isteach
result.orig: An féidir linn dul isteach
result.html: An féidir linn dul isteachCan we go inside?
result.ponchtml: An féidir linn dul isteaċCan we go inside?

result.eng: I go swimming in the pool in Salthill.
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa linn snámha i mBóthar na Trá
result.orig: Téim ag snámh sa linn snámha i mBóthar na Trá
result.html: Téim ag snámh sa linn snámha i mBóthar na TráI go swimming in the pool in Salthill.
result.ponchtml: Téim ag snáṁ sa linn snáṁa i mBóṫar na TráI go swimming in the pool in Salthill.

result.eng: Today, if we can.
result.ga: Inniu más féidir linn
result.orig: Inniu más féidir linn
result.html: Inniu más féidir linnToday, if we can.
result.ponchtml: Inniu más féidir linnToday, if we can.

result.eng: We want to get a bus today, if we can.
result.ga: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil inniu más féidir linn
result.orig: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil inniu más féidir linn

result.eng: They will not be staying with us.
result.ga: Ní bheidh siad ag fanacht in éindí linn
result.orig: Ní bheidh siad ag fanacht in éindí linn
result.html: Ní bheidh siad ag fanacht in éindí linnThey will not be staying with us.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeiḋ siad ag fanaċt in éindí linnThey will not be staying with us.

result.eng: He is the teacher that will be coming with us.
result.ga: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linn
result.orig: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linn
result.html: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linnHe is the teacher that will be coming with us.
result.ponchtml: Is é an múinteoir a ḃeas ag tíoċt linnHe is the teacher that will be coming with us.

result.eng: There are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann Tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann Tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha
result.html: Tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann Tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámhaThere are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna den ċéad scoṫ ann Tá siopaí maiṫe ann oifig an ṗoist scoileanna banc agus linn snáṁaThere are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.

result.eng: My mother's aunt is living with us as well.
result.ga: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maith
result.orig: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maith
result.html: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maithMy mother's aunt is living with us as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá aintín le mo ṁáṫair ina cónaí linn ċoṁ maiṫMy mother's aunt is living with us as well.

result.eng: There are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.html: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámhaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna maiṫe ann ionad siopadóireaċta cúpla teaċ táḃairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snáṁaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.

result.eng: During this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ga: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.orig: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin

result.ponchtml: Le linn na fostaíoċta seo níor íocaḋ aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: It's a bit rough for us.
result.ga: Is garbh linn é
result.orig: Is garbh linn é
result.html: Is garbh linn éIt's a bit rough for us.
result.ponchtml: Is garḃ linn éIt's a bit rough for us.
